fullplot: Ten vignettes in New York City: a pickpocket meets his match; a young Hasidic woman, on the eve of her marriage, reveals herself to an Indian businessman; a writer tries a pick-up line; an artist seeks a model; a composer needs to read; two women connect; a man takes a child to Central Park; lovers meet; a couple takes a walk on their anniversary; a kid goes to the prom with a girl in a wheelchair; a retired singer contemplates suicide. There are eight million stories in the naked city: these have been ten of them.
plot: Several love stories set in one of the most loved cities of the world, New York.
title: New York, I Love You

tomatoes.consensus: Like many anthologies, New York, I Love You has problems of consistency, but it isn't without its moments.
